info.title: Me pēhea e takaro ai
info.description: Matapakia te kupu i roto i {tries} ngā whakamātau. I muri i ia whakamātau, ka huringa te tae o ngā mata hei whakaatu i te tata o tō whakamātau ki te kupu.
info.correctExample: Kei roto te reta L i te kupu ā kei te wāhi tika.
info.presentExample: Kei roto te reta O i te kupu engari kāore i te wāhi tika.
info.absentExample: Kāore te reta N i roto i te kupu i tētahi wāhi rānei.

about.title: Mō tēnei kēmu kupu
about.description: He kape tēnei o te kēmu Wordle kua whakaritea mō {language} nā
about.customize: ā whakaahuatia mō tētahi atu reo! I tangohia ngā kupu mō tēnei Wordle mai
about.playOriginal: takaro i te taketake i konei
